name: Night City 2177
description: Night city is an experience, you can move around the city of the future and use several types of visions to admire its beauty. Visit the night club and feel like you are in the city of the future.
minimum_requirements: OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 (or equivalent) Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 (or equivalent) Storage: 1500 MB available space
